physical_appearance:This is a photograph featuring a neogothic stone monument. The monument is tall and narrow
 with a cross at the top. There is a statue of a man holding a book in the centre. The monument is on a flight of steps
 and is surrounded by a gate. In the background
 there is a church. The photograph has a few tears and folds especially at the top corners.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph featuring a neogothic stone monument. The monument is tall and narrow, with a cross at the top. There is a statue of a man holding a book in the centre. The monument is on a flight of steps, and is surrounded by a gate. In the background, there is a church. The photograph has a few tears and folds especially at the top corners.
